name: Tomato Soup
ingredients: tomato, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, olive oil, salt, pepper
description: A delicious tomato soup that warms the soul perfect for chilly days.
cooking_steps: In a large pot, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat, add 1 chopped onion, sauté until translucent, about 5 minutes, then stir in 2 minced garlic cloves and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes until fragrant, add 4 cups of chopped tomatoes and 4 cups of vegetable broth to the pot, bring to a boil, reduce heat and let it simmer for 20 minutes allowing the flavors to meld together, use an immersion blender to blend the soup until smooth, season with salt and pepper to taste, serve hot.

name: Onion Rings
ingredients: onion, flour, baking powder, salt, pepper, milk, oil for frying
description: Crispy onion rings that are the perfect appetizer or snack golden and delicious!
cooking_steps: Start by slicing 2 large onions into thick rings, separate the rings, in a mixing bowl combine 1 cup of all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon of baking powder, 1 teaspoon of salt and 1 teaspoon of pepper, mix well, gradually add 1 cup of milk to the dry ingredients and stir until you have a smooth batter, heat oil in a deep frying pan over medium-high heat, dip each onion ring into the batter allowing the excess to drip off and carefully place it in the hot oil, fry until golden brown about 2-3 minutes on each side, remove the onion rings and place them on paper towels to drain excess oil, serve hot with your favorite dipping sauce.

name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
ingredients: spaghetti, garlic, olive oil, red pepper flakes, parsley, salt, parmesan cheese
description: A classic Italian pasta dish that is simple yet full of flavor made with garlic and olive oil.
cooking_steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil, add 400g of spaghetti, cook according to package instructions until al dente, reserve 1 cup of pasta cooking water and drain the rest, in a large skillet heat 1/2 cup of olive oil over medium heat, add 4 minced garlic cloves, sauté until golden and fragrant, about 2 minutes, be careful not to burn the garlic, stir in 1 teaspoon of red pepper flakes and cook for another minute, add the drained spaghetti to the skillet along with the reserved pasta water, toss to combine allowing the pasta to absorb the flavors, remove from heat, add chopped parsley and grated parmesan cheese, toss again and serve immediately garnished with extra parmesan if desired.

name: Chicken Curry
ingredients: chicken, onion, garlic, ginger, curry powder, coconut milk, tomatoes, cilantro, salt
description: A rich and flavorful chicken curry that's perfect for any occasion served with rice or bread.
cooking_steps: Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large pot over medium heat, add 1 chopped onion, cook until soft, about 5 minutes, add 2 minced garlic cloves and 1 tablespoon of grated ginger, stirring for 1-2 minutes until fragrant, stir in 2 tablespoons of curry powder and cook for another minute to release its aroma, add 1 kg of chopped chicken, cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes, pour in 1 can of coconut milk and 1 can of diced tomatoes, stir to combine and bring to a simmer, reduce heat to low, cover and let it cook for 25 minutes, stirring occasionally, season with salt to taste and garnish with chopped cilantro before serving, enjoy with rice or naan.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: flour, butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, chocolate chips, baking soda, salt
description: Soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies that are a classic treat perfect for any dessert lover!
cooking_steps: Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C), in a large bowl cream together 1 cup of softened butter, 1 cup of granulated sugar and 1 cup of brown sugar until smooth, beat in 2 eggs one at a time, then stir in 2 teaspoons of vanilla extract, in another bowl combine 2 1/4 cups of flour, 1 teaspoon of baking soda and 1/2 teaspoon of salt, gradually blend the dry ingredients into the creamed mixture, fold in 2 cups of chocolate chips, drop by rounded tablespoons onto ungreased baking sheets, bake for 9 to 11 minutes in the preheated oven or until the edges are nicely golden, allow to cool on baking sheets for a few minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.
